page.title: 09Local News
page.content: Our local paper, published weekly, is called The Chronicle. The front page of the 6 June, 1985 issue told us that a mini Science Park was planned for the downtown area of the city. Gwynedd County Council, Arfon Borough Council and UCNW Bangor had agreed between them to build a 50,000 square foot building next to the Science Library, Deiniol Road for this purpose. It is hoped that some much needed new jobs will be created. Other stories included one about four pupils from Friars Upper School who were given the opportunity of being the main characters in a film being made to publicise the needs of Women's Aid. The youngest winner at this years's Urdd National Eisteddfod was a four year old Bangor girl.
